description: Helping business executives grow revenue generation capabilities as a result of excellence in the supporting go-to-market back office operations and partner relationship management. We have supported…

abstrac: Helping executives grow revenue generation capabilities as a result of excellence in supporting go-to-market back office operations, partner relationship management, and customer experience
bio:
When networking with Customer Experience professionals, the commonality of challenges they face becomes readily apparent. This seems to be true regardless of industry, market segment, product type or service offering. 

Customer Care organizations have been significantly affected by corporate cost control measures that have reduced the investment in tools, processes, and resources in order to increase profitability in challenging revenue markets. A consequence of this trend is an internal focus on operational costs, especially those investments that are difficult to directly correlate with revenue growth. 

The Customer Experience professional possesses the difficult task of maintaining or improving customer experience in the midst of a customer base with ever increasing expectations without the necessary tools and investments to be effective.

user.name: Kearra Amaya Gopee
metadata: New York, New York, United States

description.title: Freelance Photographer
description: I do portfolios, portraits, food, wedding and street photography. Also versed in Photoshop and Lightroom.

abstrac: Come hell or high water, your shoot is going to get done.
bio: Kearra Amaya is a fine art, portrait and street photographer from Trinidad & Tobago. She is a former Trinidad Guardian staff photographer. Kearra is currently based in New York where she attends St. John's University. With an eye for colour and composition, she is constantly trying to explore and master other forms of visual stimulation. When she isn't doing fancy stuff, however, you can find her in the corner of your library nibbling on gummibears. Rebel.
Currently, by email is the best way to reach me. From there, we can discuss all other terms, i.e, preferred payment methods, rates, etc.

abstrac: Helping you reach your goals one keystroke at a time.
bio:
I feel my experience with various industries and markets gives me a well rounded background and enables me to adapt to many different tasks and deliver prompt, professional results on most any project. I am a very fast and willing learner. I am easy to work with and firmly believe in giving at least 120% to everything I do.

I have been working as a virtual assistant for over 12 years. I have done everything from transcription, data entry, writing manuals, and customer service, to complete management for a counseling office in Texas.

I've been the virtual Practice Manager for a Mental Health Private Practice in Houston, TX for the past 10 years. I helped grow the practice from 4 therapists and one location, to over 30 therapists and 3 locations. 

I absolutely love my job!

description:

- Sharepoint Online:I also implement project as KPI evaluatio…

bio:
I. SharePoint Developer/consultant:
- Provide support in the development of technical proposal and provide input on the technical content and level of effort of the proposed scope of work.
- Manage Testing and Change Management: Manage testing and change management processes for SharePoint On-Premise and SharePoint Online environments.
- Develops workflow automation applications by customizing workflow task and process behaviors, using Visual Studio, Esker System, and K2 workflows.
- A new management reporting, process management and workflow layer to provide end-to-end business integration and Power BI.
- Create workflows to improve process efficiency; guide business teams on best practices.
II. Power BI Developer:
- Design and develop Microsoft SQL Integration Services programming objects for gathering, manipulating and loading data
- Manage, monitor and improve Microsoft SQL Server Analysis Services environment including ongoing changes and active product backlog.
- Experience managing and maintaining Microsoft SQL Server Analysis Services Cubes.
- Provides support and evaluation of BI Management, Application Specialists and the IS Data Warehouse team to leverage existing BI Informatics and Data Warehouse architecture.
- Analyze complex business problems to execute the vision and strategy of the Compliance organization with the overarching goal to reduce operational risk across the enterprise.
4hours/day of operation

bio:
Lalnuntluanga Chhakchhuak  was born on 28th,October 1990. He start his first school day on the age of 5. He was a weak, timid and coward boy. Some of his friends often disturbed and tortured him, but he never get back to them due to lack of physical strength. He was not only physically weak, but also behind his friends in terms of Education till his middle school days.

On the high school level a lot of change happened in him. All his weakness were gone and started to become one of the top students in the class. His favourite subject are science and mathematics the subject which he always score above 85%. On 2009 he was graduated in HSSLC from Helen Lowry School. And graduated in BCA course from Govt. Zirtiri Residential College which was under Mizoram University. Unfortunately, result was publish lately then most of their Class batch were unable to join MCA course for the next academic year.

Apart from education, his hobby is playing musical instrume
